title: New LG Soundbar S95QR and LG TV for Podcast Room Upgrade!
description: Thank you to LG for sponsoring this video! This LG Soundbar S95QR is so cool, especially if you use it with some other LG TVs to enable the unique features WOW Orchestra and WOW Interface - definitely not your average soundbar! For more information on the LG Soundbar click here:    0:00 LG Soundbar S95QR 2:22 WOW Interface 4:11 WOW Orchestra Demo  #lgsoundbar #soundbarforTV #soundbar#BestSoundbarforTV#DolbyAtmosSoundbar #Bluetoothsoundbar #Bestsoundbar2023 #Wirelesssoundbar#WOWOrchestra #WOWInterface #S95QR #OLEDTV #BestTV #Ad    PLEASE SUBSCRIBE:  GET MY PINK iJUSTINE CABLES HERE:   GET MY EDITING PLUGIN:    MUSIC I USE:    GET YOUR OURA RING:    FRIEND ME HERE:        MY NEW PROJECT:   PODCAST:
